about.title: Best car rental company in Poland
about.desc: Our rental service enables efficient car rental in as many as 12 cities in Poland. Cars from our offer are fully functional, washed and filled up to allow you to enjoy your ride without any worries. Rent today and see for yourself!

who.heading: Who we are
who.desc: Car rental company with 20 years tradidtion. We are doing our best to keep number one position in Poland
